  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_82207</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82207</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Diffusion of carbon dioxide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diffusion (Zerstäubung) des Kohlendioxyds</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diffusion d'anhydride carbonique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Difusão do dióxido de carbono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diffusione dell'anidride carbonica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάχυση του διοξειδίου του άνθρακα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Difusión del bióxido de carbono</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how carbon dioxide diffuses from a region of high concentration to a region of low concentration.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">concentration gradient</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Diffusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Kohlendioxyd von einer
Region der hohen Konzentration zu einer Region der niedrigen 
Konzentration diffundiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment l'anhydride 
carbonique répand d'une région de concentration élevée à une 
région de basse concentration.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o dióxido de 
carbono difunde de uma região da concentração elevada a uma região
da concentração baixa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come l'anidride 
carbonica si diffonde da una regione di alta concentrazione ad una 
regione di concentrazione bassa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς το διοξείδιο του 
άνθρακα διασκορπίζει από μια περιοχή της υψηλής συγκέντρωσης σε 
μια περιοχή της χαμηλής συγκέντρωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo el bióxido de 
carbono difunde de una región de la alta concentración a una región
de la concentración baja.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konzentration Steigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diffusion (Zerstäubung)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anhydride carbonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">gradient de concentration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diffusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gradient da concentração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Difusão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anidride carbonica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pendenza di concentrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diffusione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διοξείδιο του άνθρακα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κλίση συγκέντρωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάχυση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gradiente de la concentración</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Difusión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
